00001 def mixed(ind, prob, params, random):
00002     for i in xrange(0, len(ind.genome['style'])):
00003         if random.random() < prob:
00004             ind.genome['style'][i] = ind.genome['style'][i] ^ 1
00005 
00006     for i in xrange(0, len(ind.genome['grid'])):
00007         if random.random() < prob:
00008             swapIndex = random.randint(0, len(ind.genome['grid'])-1)
00009             temp = ind.genome['grid'][i]
00010             ind.genome['grid'][i] = ind.genome['grid'][swapIndex]
00011             ind.genome['grid'][swapIndex] = temp
